derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from grape + fruit (probably because the fruits grow in clusters)

entry.def: A grapefruit is a large, round, yellow fruit, similar to an orange, that has a sharp, slightly bitter taste.

means.word_mean: 1. citrus tree bearing large round edible fruit having a thick yellow rind and juicy somewhat acid pulp
2. large yellow fruit with somewhat acid juicy pulp; usual serving consists of a half
